articles.title: 'This is unacceptable': ICC ripped apart for ‘terrible’ drop-in New York pitch after low-scoring SL vs SA T20WC match - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Experts ripped apart ICC after a bizarre T20 World Cup match between Sri Lanka and South Africa where 157 runs were scored at a rate of 4.4 runs per over | Crickit
articles.content: An unusually low-scoring match between Sri Lanka and South Africa on Monday, in Group D of the 2024 T20 World Cup, sparked criticism from veteran cricketers and experts, with ICC blasted for the trea… [+2511 chars]

articles.content:
